authors.name: Denise Roth Barber
authors.affiliation: National Institute On Money In State Politics

title: Follow The Money: National Institute On Money In State Politics
description: The National Institute On Money In State Politics collects comprehensive state and federal political spending data and makes it freely available at FollowTheMoney.org. The 2018 state elections are on track to break records with 36 Governor races, 74 Supreme Court races, and 82% of legislative seats on ballots in 46 states.
